name: Girl's phone, Toy for little princess
name_original: Girl's phone, Toy for little princess
description:
Presenting all in one toy phone for your little princess .
* Girly theme, cute animations
* music, games and more for your princess

Phone for girls has everything that your girl needs, Cute graphics, bright colors, sweet sounds, a perfect theme to adore. Give your little princess a perfect play phone of her choice.
Yes, we have all in this, a perfect application to keep little princes engaged for hours.
A game that is designed just for the little girls keeping her interest throughout the application. Let her fly with the colorful butterfly.
This game will give your daughter a real life experience of using a phone; they can dial numbers, answer a call, send messages, play games, and also have some fun with musical instruments.
Below are the features that we have included for your baby’s phone:
A specially designed theme and animations keeping in mind the taste of your daughter
Dial Numbers: Dial numbers from 0 to 9 by tapping the buttons and also hear the sound of the number pressed
Phone book: Predefined contact list with common names and funny characters
Messages: Chat with friends, use smiley or text messages
Incoming/ Missed call: Incoming calls pop up to get your little one excited to answer the call, sometimes get a missed call alert too.
Music Screen: Play different musical instruments and listen to the musical notes with a tap
Games: Interactive and engaging games for the little ones for hours on fun.
A game that is designed to keep your baby engage on their own while you are out on a long journey or waiting in a line.
